text: i like jira, it’s more powerful and easier to navigate than trello IMO
but if we’re not going to be inputting bugs for the CMS (??), then my opinion doesn’t really matter
i would say that i also prefer JIRA to Trello
If we're talking about visual QA I vote for Trello. Jira is over complicated for that use case IMO.

i see what you mean gaston- <@U026AP8CM> are you asking about a tool for bugs or for visual QA?
yes
yes both?
visual QA
sorry, read that too fast to realize there were two options
heh, no problem
ok lets go with trello since everything will be largely directed at gaston and that's his tool of choice :blush:
sounds good i'll get it set up
Thanks <@U0260V1BX>. Didn't mean to impose Trello. I'm totally cool with JIRA if we need/want to use it.
no i dont have a strong preference
Cool.
Hello from waiting room! I second the use of Trello. So much speedier IMHO
Thanks David! Will get that set up
then again - we're getting this from a guy on drugs with a balloon in his nose
Har har har

[trapit-site-2014/master] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/dd46ae2ac89d1d40a9af104596b685238b824bbf|dd46ae2ac89d>: Added mobile nav.
 - gastonfig
<@U0260V1BX> what does the mobile "get a free demo" button on the footer do?
it opens the form modal
the design for that modal is in the PDF documentaiton / mobile wire sketch file
Oh, thanks.
One more thing <@U0260V1BX>, do we have any flexibility RE: the phone number on the footer for mobile?
sure, how do you mean

The way we have it coded is so there're 3 cols and the phone # is on the 1st one. When things change on mobile our layout doesn't let us make that phone  # it's own row that extends beyond the the "Palo alto" col. Does that make sense?
It's hard to explain but I can show you if you have a sec.

<@U02618EV1> do you have our typekit into for proxima nova?
<@U0260V1BX> I see. Would it be possible to add this to post lunch? This will change the structure of the entire block.

<@U02613K0X> <script type="text/javascript" src="//use.typekit.net/now4gig.js"></script>
        <script type="text/javascript">try{Typekit.load();}catch(e){}</script>
so here's the issue: we can't hide the summaries on mobile
those need to be visible
I see. Trying to think of a solve. Thinking of the interaction since we have a small button that would disappear on tap but the space it occupies remains the same and buttons fade in from behind.
not sure i understand, coming over
<@U02618EV1> can you give me the info to view it on typekit?
Sorry, don't I follow. Do you need the info on how to implement the fonts?
*I don't think I follow.
yeah. maybe i’m confused. aren’t they registered to uncorked's typekit account? if so, can’t i login to that account and view the rules for using the font?
We're actually using Trapit's account and I don't think we have creds. That said, I don't think you need creds. Will send you an email with some quick instructions.
oook
thx
